Synopsis: Modifies the global TCP/IP offload settings.
Description: The Set-NetOffloadGlobalSetting cmdlet modifies the global TCP/IP offload settings. The global settings include Receive Side Scaling, Receive Segment Coalescing, task offload, and NetworkDirect properties.

Examples.Title: Example 1: Enable Receive Segment Coalescing
Examples.Code:
PS C:\>Set-NetOffloadGlobalSetting â€“ReceiveSegmentCoalescing Enabled
This command enables Receive Segment Coalescing on the computer.
